DOC.detailed_description: Rotavirus lead cause severe acute diarrhea gastroenteritis among young child worldwide . In first 5 year life , 90 % child experience least one episode rotavirus infection.Each year , rotavirus diarrhea responsible 440,000 death , 2 million hospitalization , 25 million outpatient visit among child young 5 year worldwide . In South Korea , rotavirus diarrhea rarely cause mortality , cause significant morbidity . A recent population-based study Korea estimate annual incidence rotavirus diarrhea account 56.9 case per 1,000 child less 5 year old . Oral , live pentavalent human-bovine reassortant rotavirus vaccine develop license use prevent rotavirus disease many country . Yet , research do assess impact national rotavirus immunization program Korea . It expect systematic appraisal national burden rotavirus infection potential public health economic benefit rotavirus vaccination child Korea assist health policy maker set priority prevention disease .
